title: Client always crashes in champ select
body: My league client crashed majority of the time in champ select. How do i fix this?

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs like play.tv, lolrecorder, etc?  They can cause crashes like this, and removing them would be your best bet.  If that's not the case for you, let me know if you're getting any error messages and what you mean exactly by crash.  Let me know!
OK ill try doing that and ill let you know. Thanks for replying
